Name: condition_team_cross_functional
Description: Ensure a team has all required roles covered

Name: condition_worker_certified
Description: Critical features must be developed by certified workers

Name: condition_project_on_budget
Description: Project budget must not be exceeded

Name: condition_no_critical_blockers
Description: No active blockers with 'critical' severity are allowed

Name: condition_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: condition_user_story_estimated
Description: All user stories in a sprint must have story points

Name: condition_task_status_valid
Description: All tasks must have a valid status (e.g.

Name: condition_feature_high_priority
Description: Features with 'critical' priority must be included in the next release

Name: condition_scrum_master_experienced
Description: The Scrum Master must have sufficient experience for the team size
